TopicTitle: Funny mathematical humor i just found

Articles.Content:
Is Polish Joke i translated it to English fo you :-)

 

Humor from under the blackboard, Teacher ask student
T - Jas(Johnny), if your mother is 34 years older than your sister and you are 5 years younger than your sister and are now 10 years old, how old is your mother?
S - Madam! Gentleman never ask a woman for her age!
